\describe{
\item{DOY}{day of year in given year}
\item{Ta}{average temperature of given day (Celsius).}
\item{Tmin}{minimum temperature of given day (Celsius).}
\item{Tmax}{maximum temperature of given day (Celsius).}
\item{precip}{precipitation in millimeter per day.}
\item{rSSD}{relative sunshine duration (%) *apparently unused*.}
\item{SRad}{average sunlight irradiance in 1/0.47 J/s/m^2. In other words, this
value will be converted to photosynthetically active radiation (PAR) in 
MJ/m^2 as: 
`PAR = SRad * 0.47 * 24 * 60 * 60 / 1e6`}
\item{ET0}{evapotranspiration in mm. Currently calculated here. Should be 
calculated in model from day length.}
\item{snow}{calculated by model.}
}
